Name: Drill knee
Text: If this attack is blocked, deal 2L

Name: Hand blades 1
Text: When placed, put an extra card from your hand down and add this cards value to it

Name: Hand blades 2
Text: When placed, put an extra card from your hand down and add this cards value to it

Name: Transform
Text: Until the end of your next turn, all ranged attcks get +4 range and +1 dmg, and you get -1 mv

Name: Run Sensors
Text: If resolved - next turn +1 init +1 card

Name: Fakeout
Text: When this card resolves, look at the top two cards of your deck, choose one and apply that instead

Name: Combo Strike
Text: \footnotesize{When revealed, choose 2 of the top 3 cards of the deck and discard them - this card gains the sum of their movement, blocks and attacks}
